# Conventional Commit template
#
# Format:
#   <type>(<scope>): <summary>
#
# Types:
#   feat, fix, chore, docs, refactor, test
#
# Examples:
#   feat(api): add rank snapshot filters
#   fix(web/auth): prevent refresh token loop
#
# Optional body (what/why):
#
# Optional footer (issue refs):
#   Closes #123
